title: METATOWEL #IStakeMyTowel Distribution Mechanic
what_we_claimed: Anyone who tweets #IStakeMyTowel with a conviction pick will earn METATOWEL based on attention generated. Belief is the bet. Early believers get paid out.
what_we_built: The hashtag. Leo posted his own stake. 2 people participated, 1 returned asking about their reward, 1M TOWEL sent manually.
why_it_died: Announced 24h before the Super Bowl. No automated hashtag tracking, no distribution script, no mechanic for measuring attention-per-tweet. Required infrastructure that didn't exist and wasn't built in time.
what_we_learned: Non-zero meme movement — 2 participants and 1 return inquiry proves the concept has pull. The campaign showed demand. The mechanic just needed more than 24 hours and a real distribution layer. Conviction-as-signal is the right thesis; METATOWEL was the wrong vehicle.
what_lives: story.markets as the staking surface. Season 2 launch gives 2+ days to design the mechanic properly. #StakeYourTowel campaign carries forward with real infrastructure behind it.

title: METATOWEL Premature Utility Claims
what_we_claimed: METATOWEL will have larger price and volume movement; will reward creator with more creator rewards; implied distinct mechanics differentiating it from TOWEL.
what_we_built: The token. The launch. The separation-of-meme-and-state framing. No distinct mechanics were built beyond what pump.fun provides natively.
why_it_died: Announced before the architecture was clear. The two-token model is right but wasn't specced until much later. Creator rewards were a platform feature, not a MetaSPN product.
what_we_learned: The correct architecture: METATOWEL = operational cash (profits recycled into liquidity, keeps trading active), TOWEL = conviction stock (held, staked, rewarded, long-term value). Cash and stock. This is Season 2 territory — needs real profit flow before the story becomes true.
what_lives: The two-token architecture. Season 2: first x402 revenue → first METATOWEL buy. That's when the story stops being a plan and starts being a fact.
recommit: Season 2 — when profit flow exists to actually recycle into METATOWEL liquidity. Story first, then mechanics.

title: Profit Payout to Early Believers — Vague Mechanic
what_we_claimed: Will pay out profits based on how early people were willing to believe in a hashtag. Early belief = larger share.
what_we_built: 1M TOWEL sent manually to one returning participant. No tracking system. No automated distribution. No profits to share (portfolio ~$12 net).
why_it_died: Claimed on Day 0 before any profits existed. No infrastructure for timestamp-weighted distribution. No profits materialized at the scale needed.
what_we_learned: The principle is right — reward early conviction. The implementation was vague and premature. Needs: (1) a defined revenue trigger, (2) a list of verified early stakers, (3) a specific share percentage.
what_lives: Season 2 first profit share payout. Formal commitment written separately at clawd/commitments/season2-profit-share.md
recommit: Season 2 launch — first MetaSPN profit share. Primary goal of Season 2.
